style.label: Style:
style.description: Qt style to use for the user interface

theme.label: Theme:
theme.description: Theme to use for the user interface (may require restart)

font_point_size.label: Font size:
font_point_size.description: Font point size to use for user interface text (may require restart)

tab_font_point_size.label: Tab font size:
tab_font_point_size.description: Font point size to use for user interface tab labels (may require restart)

show_tool_control_hints.label: Show active tool control hints:
show_tool_control_hints.description: Show control hints for the active tool below the image.

animate_outlines.label: Animate outlines and selections:
animate_outlines.description: Enable or disable animated outlines (may require restart)

selection_color.label: Selection overlay color:
selection_color.description: Overlay color used to highlight selected image areas

show_selections_in_generation_options.label: Show selections in generated image options:
show_selections_in_generation_options.description: Draw the selection borders when choosing inpainted image options.

selection_screen_zooms_to_changed.label: Show generated images zoomed to changes:
selection_screen_zooms_to_changed.description: When zooming in on individual inpainting options, focus the change region.

show_options_full_resolution.label: Show generated image options at original size
show_options_full_resolution.description: When the selected image size doesn't match the image generation resolution, preview options using the generated size.

opengl_acceleration.label: OpenGL acceleration:
opengl_acceleration.description: Use OpenGL to accelerate image rendering.  Currently somewhat buggy, breaks several layer rendering modes.

tool_tab_bar.label: Tool tab bar:
tool_tab_bar.description: Toolbar where the tool tab is placed by default (TOP|BOTTOM|LEFT|RIGHT|LOWER or empty)

generation_tab_bar.label: Image generation tab bar:
generation_tab_bar.description: Toolbar where the image generation tab is placed by default (TOP|BOTTOM|LEFT|RIGHT|LOWER or empty)

controlnet_tab_bar.label: ControlNet tab bar:
controlnet_tab_bar.description: Toolbar where the ControlNet tab is placed by default (TOP|BOTTOM|LEFT|RIGHT|LOWER or empty)

default_image_size.label: Default image size:
default_image_size.description: Default size when creating new images

edit_size.label: Editing size:
edit_size.description: Current/initial size in pixels of the area selected for editing

max_edit_size.label: Maximum editing size:
max_edit_size.description: Maximum size in pixels of the area selected for editing

min_edit_size.label: Minimum editing size:
min_edit_size.description: Minimum size in pixels of the area selected for editing

generation_size.label: Generation size:
generation_size.description: Current/initial size in pixels used for AI image generation

max_generation_size.label: Maximum generation size:
max_generation_size.description: Maximum size in pixels allowed for AI image generation

min_generation_size.label: Minimum generation size:
min_generation_size.description: Minimum size in pixels allowed for AI image generation

selection_brush_size.label: Selection brush size:
selection_brush_size.description: Current/initial brush size (in pixels) for the selection tool.

sketch_brush_size.label: Brush size:
sketch_brush_size.description: Current/initial brush size (in pixels) for drawing tools.

eraser_size.label: Eraser size:
eraser_size.description: Current/initial brush size (in pixels) for the eraser tool.

brush_favorites.label: Favorite MyPaint brushes:
brush_favorites.description: Brushes to list in the 'Favorites' tab of the brush selection window

max_undo.label: Maximum undo count:
max_undo.description: Number of actions that can be reversed using the 'undo' option.

undo_merge_interval.label: Undo merge interval (seconds):
undo_merge_interval.description: Similar actions will be combined in the undo history if the time between them is less than this.

speed_modifier_multiplier.label: 'Speed modifier' key multiplier:
speed_modifier_multiplier.description: Controls how much faster changes happen when the 'speed_modifier' key is held down

saved_colors.label: Saved colors:
saved_colors.description: List of saved custom color values.

min_pressure_value.label: Minimum pressure value
min_pressure_value.description: All nonzero pen pressure readings will be boosted up to this value at a minimum.

max_pressure_value.label: Maximum pressure value
max_pressure_value.description: All pen pressure readings will be capped at this value.

min_pressure_threshold.label: Minimum pressure threshold
min_pressure_threshold.description: Lower bounds of pen pressure input. Pressure values will be scaled so that this value becomes the minimum pressure value.

max_pressure_threshold.label: Maximum pressure threshold
max_pressure_threshold.description: Upper bounds of pen pressure input. Pressure values will be scaled so that this value becomes the maximum pressure value

prompt.label: Prompt:
prompt.description: Description that generated images should match.

negative_prompt.label: Negative prompt:
negative_prompt.description: Description that generated images should not match.

guidance_scale.label: Guidance scale:
guidance_scale.description: Controls how strongly the prompt and negative prompt are applied. Higher values are more consistent but may be less creative.  Overly high or low values may cause image distortion.

batch_size.label: Batch size:
batch_size.description: Number of image options to simultaneously create in a single image editing operation. Increasing this value too much may result in errors or slowdown if GPU memory limits are reached.

batch_count.label: Batch count:
batch_count.description: Number of image batches to create in a single image editing operation. Increasing this value doesn't require additional memory, but it slows down image editing more than increasing the batch size does.

edit_mode.label: Edit mode:
edit_mode.description: Stable-Diffusion image editing mode. 'Text to Image' completely replaces the selected image section with new content, 'Image to Image' creates altered versions of the image selection, and 'Inpaint' works like 'Image to Image' except that it only affects areas selected by the mask tool

masked_content.label: Masked content:
masked_content.description: Determines what should be used to fill the masked area before inpainting. 'fill' replaces it with a solid color, 'original' keeps it as-is, 'latent noise' replaces it with random data, and 'latent nothing' clears it. Unless you're inpainting with a denoising strength >0.8, 'original' will almost always be the best option

interrogate_model.label: Image interrogation model:
interrogate_model.description: Model used when auto-generating appropriate prompts using the 'interrogate' button. Supported values will vary based on what extensions you've installed into the stable-generation-webui, but 'clip' should always be accepted.

sampling_steps.label: Sampling steps:
sampling_steps.description: Number of diffusion operations to perform when generating image data. Higher values take longer, but often produce more detailed and accurate results. Different stable-diffusion models and samplers have different requirements, but in most cates setting this higher than 30 has only minimal benefits

denoising_strength.label: Denoising strength:
denoising_strength.description: Controls how dramatically inpainting and image-to-image operations will change the initial image data. At 0.0, the image will be completely unedited, at 1.0 the image will be completely different

sampling_method.label: Sampling method:
sampling_method.description: Mathematical technique used to transform image data during the generation process. 'Euler a' works well in most cases, but certain models or extensions might perform better with other options.

upscale_method.label: Upscale method:
upscale_method.description: Method to use when increasing image resolution. Available options will be loaded from the stable-diffusion-webui on launch.

controlnet_upscaling.label: ControlNet tiled upscaling
controlnet_upscaling.description: Whether to use the ControlNet tile model to improve image upscaling. When enabled and supported, all other image generation options will influence upscaling results. To use this, the ControlNet extension needs to be installed in the stable-diffusion-webui, and the controlnet tile model needs to be downloaded to the correct folder.

controlnet_tile_model.label: ControlNet tiled upscaling model:
controlnet_tile_model.description: ControlNet model to use for tiled upscaling, in the 'filename [hash]' format used by the webui. This only needs to change if a newer model is available if using a stable diffusion model not based on stable-diffusion 1.5.

controlnet_downsample_rate.label: Tile downsample rate:
controlnet_downsample_rate.description: Adjusts how strongly the ControlNet tile model preserves the original image data, higher values result in fewer changes.

mask_blur.label: Mask blur:
mask_blur.description: Pixel radius to blur in the inpainting mask to smoothly combine edited and original image content.

seed.label: Seed:
seed.description: Number used to control pseudo-random aspects of image generation, in most cases using the same seed with the same settings and inputs will always produce the same results. If set to -1, a different random seed will be used for each image generation.

inpaint_full_res.label: Inpaint Full Resolution
inpaint_full_res.description: If true, inpaint the masked area at higher resolution by ignoring the unmasked area. This can increase image quality by sacrificing awareness of additional image content.

inpaint_full_res_padding.label: Padding:
inpaint_full_res_padding.description: Pixel radius outside of the masked area to include when inpainting when the 'Inpaint Full Resolution' option is enabled. Higher values increase contextual awareness while decreasing overall level of detail.

restore_faces.label: Restore faces
restore_faces.description: Use a face restoration model to correct image data after stable-diffusion runs. In most cases you'll probably get better results without it.

tiling.label: Tiling
tiling.description: Generate tiling images that can be seamlessly repeated.

cutn.label: Detail reference count (cutn):
cutn.description: Determines how many random cutouts from the input image are used to guide image generation. Higher values can introduce more detail and variation, but may also introduce more noise and irrelevant information.

skip_steps.label: Skip steps:
skip_steps.description: Number of diffusion steps to skip. Higher values will result in faster image generation with decreased detail and accuracy.

upscale_mode.label: Upscale mode:
upscale_mode.description: Upscaling mode used when the inpainting resolution doesn't match the image generation area size.

downscale_mode.label: Downscale mode:
downscale_mode.description: Downscaling mode used when the inpainting resolution doesn't match the image generation area size.

glid_model_path.label: GLID-3-XL model path:
glid_model_path.description: Path to the main GLID-3-XL model file

bert_model_path.label: BERT model path:
bert_model_path.description: Path to the BERT language model file

glid_vae_model_path.label: GLID-3-XL VAE model path:
glid_vae_model_path.description: Path to the VAE latent image encoding/decoding model file

clip_model_name.label: CLIP model name:
clip_model_name.description: Name of the CLIP language model to use.

use_error_handler.label: Enable global error handler:
use_error_handler.description: Attempt to catch and report global application errors instead of crashing. Disabling this makes it easier to debug certain errors.

warn_on_key_error.label: Warn about keybinding issues:
warn_on_key_error.description: Show an alert when keybinding issues are found on startup.

warn_before_layerless_save.label: Warn when saving without layers:
warn_before_layerless_save.description: Show a warning popup when saving a multi-layer image in a format that discards layer data.

warn_before_rgb_save.label: Warn when saving without transparency:
warn_before_rgb_save.description: Show a warning popup when saving an image with transparency in a format that doesn't support it.

warn_before_save_without_metadata.label: Warn when saving without metadata:
warn_before_save_without_metadata.description: Show a warning popup when saving an image in a format that discards metadata.

warn_before_write_only_save.label: Warn when saving in a format that cannot be loaded:
warn_before_write_only_save.description: Show a warning popup when saving an image in a format that can't be loaded.

warn_before_fixed_size_save.label: Warn when saving in a format that changes image size:
warn_before_fixed_size_save.description: Show a warning popup when saving an image in a format requires a specific resolution.

warn_before_color_loss.label: Warn when saving in a format that removes color:
warn_before_color_loss.description: Show a warning popup when saving an image in a format that does not support color.

warn_on_libmypaint_error.label: Warn when loading libmypaint fails:
warn_on_libmypaint_error.description: Show a warning popup when the brush tool cannot be used because of missing libraries.

always_init_metadata_on_save.label: Always save metadata:
always_init_metadata_on_save.description: Always save metadata when no previous metadata exists(confirm), never do that(cancel), or ask every time(always_ask).

always_update_metadata_on_save.label: Always update metadata:
always_update_metadata_on_save.description: Always update metadata when images are saved(confirm), never do that(cancel), or ask every time(always_ask).

added_font_dir.label: Added font directory:
added_font_dir.description: Directory to search for additional font files to load

added_mypaint_brush_dir.label: Added MyPaint brush directory:
added_mypaint_brush_dir.description: Directory to search for additional MyPaint brush files to load

libmypaint_library_dir.label: libmypaint library directory:
libmypaint_library_dir.description: Directory to search for libmypaint library files if unable to load default libraries
